divs: Sighting DetailsMy friends and I were out goofing off. Local coffee shop Sambo's was open 24 hours. they went in and I elected to stay outside in the car. I was reading the bible for the first time in my life.(Revelation) I looked up in the sky in the distance and what appeared to be a star I noticed kept getting brighter. I kind of started talking to it and the light kept getting closer. the closer it got I could make out 3 red blinking lights in the shape of a triangle. this was really freaking me out but I really enjoyed this kind of wierdness. anyway long story short when it came very close I sat my butt in the car window and looked over the car. they slowly moved and gradually were almost over my head when I realized that the pulsating red lights were not on one unit but three because they were not in sync perfectly. They made not a sound. I could see the units were silvery metalic and cigar shaped or bullet shaped like a blimp. they came immediately over my head. two gents drove into the parking lot and got out of their truck and I screamed at them to look at what I was witnessing. it was as if they did not hear me. However, my friends (about 6 or 7) finally exited the restaurant and I told them to look up and they all saw it too. I thought it was going to take me away so I started telling it to go away. when my friends all came outside it did start going away slowly. I was scared shitless because I had called it to me. I am not crazy but I have held that inside for many many years. You can take this information or leave it. I know what I saw and nothing will ever convince me otherwise. Hell yes they are out there.
